items.title: Get a more adaptive cleaning experience with Greenworks’ Pro 3,000 PSI electric pressure washer at $320 (Reg. $450)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the newest Greenworks Pro 3,000 PSI Electric Pressure Washer at $319.99 shipped. Normally fetching $450 at full price, discounts over the year have largely kept costs above $330, save for a few drops to the $292 low until Prime Day cut the tag to $305. If you missed out on the two-day-only Prime rate, you can get it for just $15 higher in price while these savings last. You’re still getting a solid $130 markdown here, which lands it at the third-lowest price we have tracked and equips you with the latest and most powerful of the brand’s electric pressure washers.

items.title: EcoFlow’s extended Prime Day savings take up to 60% off TRAIL compact power stations at new lows from $104
items.summary:
As part of its extended Prime Day Sale, EcoFlow is continuing to offer the best rates yet on its new TRAIL series of power stations, with extra sitewide savings too. You can pick up the TRAIL 200 DC 60,000mAh Portable Power Station at $103.55 shipped, after using the code 25PDFAFF at checkout for an additional 5% off, while the TRAIL 300 DC 90,000mAh Portable Power Station is down at $141.55 shipped, after using the same code. What’s more, you’ll be getting a free RAPID 30W GaN Charger too (valued at $26), with the prices here also beating out Amazon by up to $7. These new charging solutions launched back at the top of August carrying $200 and $250 MSRPs, which we saw brought down to $113 and $151 with launch savings, dropping further to these rates for the earlier phase of the brand’s Prime Day Sale. You’re getting an extended period to pick them up at the best rates we have tracked, with a total $96 and $108 in savings off the going rates on top of the additional $26 in free gear. Head below to also check out their bundle options.

more…

Buy for $8 (Reg. $16)

What we love

I think it’s safe to say that we’ve all got one wall outlet in our home that works harder than the rest. I’ve been using a similar outlet extender in my office from Addtam for over a year now and love it.

We’ve seen the standard variant of MX Keys Mini keyboard go for less, but this is the lowest price we can find for the Mac version optimized for a native Apple experience. You can also get this in Pale Grey, though it’s seeing a relatively lighter deal down to $79.98 shipped. items.title: Timex is resurrecting its first LCD watch 50 years later
items.summary: In 1972, Hamilton’s Pulsar Time Computer launched the first commercially sold digital watch, but its LED screen was power hungry and only showed the time when you pushed a button. items.summary:
Baseus’ 100W braided right-angle USB-C cable

Buy for $8 (Reg. $15)

Enter promo code 38FF3V28 for $2 off.

What we love

We see a fair share of USB-C cables go on sale every day, but the ones with a right-angle USB-C connector rarely see a price drop this deep. This 3.3-foot braided Baseus cable is nearly 50% off and even features a cool “Atmosphere Light” glow to indicate charging status. It supports up to 100W charging, making it perfect for fast-charging phones — and for gamers who want a better grip while plugged in.

items.title: Intel says 18A-based Panther Lake chips can deliver 50% more performance at similar power to its Lunar Lake chips, details RibbonFET efficiency gains, and more (Jeffrey Kampman/Tom's Hardware)
items.summary:
Jeffrey Kampman / Tom's Hardware:
Intel says 18A-based Panther Lake chips can deliver 50% more performance at similar power to its Lunar Lake chips, details RibbonFET efficiency gains, and more  —  Panther Lake brings the power efficiency and graphics performance of Lunar Lake and the platform flexibility of Arrow Lake all together on one SoC

items.title: GoPro’s HERO13 Black Ultra-Wide Edition with 177-degree FOV lens mod back to $330 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find GoPro’s HERO13 Black Ultra Wide lens bundle going for $329.99 shipped. This bundle debuted a few months after the camera’s original launch carrying a $480 price tag, and it comes with a pre-installed Ultra Wide lens mod right out of the box. Today’s deal shaves $150 off its usual going rate to land it back at the lowest price we first tracked for it in August. This discounted bundle delivers serious value at the discounted price today as the HERO13 Black action camera itself is fetching $360 right now without the lens mod. Head below for more details.

items.title: Heads up: You can secure the most affordable M4 iPad Pro at its best price right now on Amazon
items.summary:
Particularly notable deals on the most affordable M4 iPad Pro are generally quite rare. We do see the 256GB 11-inch model at $100 off on a regular basis, but anything more than that is nearly unheard of. However, Amazon now has this model listed at $799.99 shipped – it is temporarily out of stock but you can lock in the best price we have tracked right now at $199 off.

more…

items.title: New models are inbound, but Best Buy is offering $800 off M3 Pro MacBook Pro models right now
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day M4 MacBook Air deals are live and quite notable at up to $230 off the list prices, the M4 MacBook though…not so much. You can land a solid discount on the base model M4 MBP, but after seeing solid $300 discounts for a couple months and reports suggesting stock is dwindling at Apple stores, options are thin right now. That said, if you’re looking to land a huge deal on a MacBook Pro and don’t mind a previous-gen version, Best Buy is offering up to $800 off the original list prices right now on select M3 Pro configs as part of its Techtober sale.
